organization.description: Data related to health, medicine, health care services, etc. in the United States of America.
organization.title: US Health and Healthcare
organization.name: us-health-and-healthcare

name: behavioral-health-treatment-needs-assessment-toolkit
notes:
**Description:**

> The Behavioral Health Treatment Needs Assessment Toolkit is intended to provide states and other payers with information on the prevalence and use of behavioral health services; step-by-step instructions to generate projects of utilization under insurance expansions; and factors to consider when deciding the appropriate mix of behavioral health benefits, services, and providers to meet the needs of newly eligible populations. The Toolkit has been developed by the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration (SAMHSA).

**Included Subsets:**

* *Treatment*—[Receipt of Mental Health and Substance Use Treatment in Past Year Among Adults Aged 18–64 Years](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/receipt-of-mental-health-and-substance-use-treatment-in-past-year-among-adults-aged-1864-y "CKAN Page")
* *Treatment, Medicaid, by State*—[Receipt of Mental Health and Substance Use Treatment in Past Year Among Adults Aged 18–64 Years with Medicaid Coverage, by State](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/receipt-of-mental-health-and-substance-use-treatment-in-past-year-among-adults-aged-1864-y-36e6f "CKAN Page")

**Subsets to Add:**

Treatment:

* [Receipt of Mental Health and Substance Use Treatment in Past Year Among Adults Aged 18–64 Years Who Are Uninsured and Have Annual Family Incomes < 139 Percent of Federal Poverty Level, by State](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/receipt-of-mental-health-and-substance-use-treatment-in-past-year-among-adults-aged-1864-y-c6bb9 "CKAN Page")
* [Receipt of Mental Health and Substance Use Treatment in Past Year Among Adults Aged 18–64 Years Who are Uninsured and Have Annual Family Incomes Between 133 and 399 Percent of Federal Poverty Level, by State](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/receipt-of-mental-health-and-substance-use-treatment-in-past-year-among-adults-aged-1864-y-df9f2 "CKAN Page")

Prevalence:

* [Prevalence of Behavioral Health Conditions in Past Year Among Adults Aged 18–64 Years](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/prevalence-of-behavioral-health-conditions-in-past-year-among-adults-aged-1864-years "CKAN Page")
* [Prevalence of Behavioral Health Conditions in Past Year Among Adults Aged 18–64 Years with Current Medicaid Coverage, by State](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/prevalence-of-behavioral-health-conditions-in-past-year-among-adults-aged-1864-years-with- "CKAN Page")
* [Prevalence of Behavioral Health Conditions in Past Year Among Adults Aged 18–64 Years Who Are Uninsured and Have Annual Family Incomes < 139 Percent of Federal Poverty Level, by State](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/prevalence-of-behavioral-health-conditions-in-past-year-among-adults-aged-1864-years-who-a "CKAN Page")
* [Prevalence of Behavioral Health Conditions in Past Year Among Adults Aged 18–64 Years Who Are Uninsured and Have Annual Family Incomes Between 133 and 399 Percent of Federal Poverty Level, by State](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/prevalence-of-behavioral-health-conditions-in-past-year-among-adults-aged-1864-years-who-a-503d7 "CKAN Page")

Population:

* [Adults Aged 18–64 Years Who Have Annual Family Incomes < 139 Percent of Federal Poverty Level, by Insurance Status, Nationally and by State](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/adults-aged-1864-years-who-have-annual-family-incomes-139-percent-of-federal-poverty-level "CKAN Page")
* [Adults Aged 18–64 Years Who Have Annual Family Incomes Between 133 and 399 Percent of Federal Poverty Level, by Insurance Status, Nationally and by State](http://hub.healthdata.gov/dataset/adults-aged-1864-years-who-have-annual-family-incomes-between-133-and-399-percent-of-feder "CKAN Page")
